Description: Foot and part of floor of East Greek pottery plate or dish. Low ring foot. Underside reserved with slightly concave stand surface; on floor, cream slip and frieze of lotus buds and triple verticals around central disc; outside reserved. Minor graffiti, probably intentional.
Bibliographic references: Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GG.1083)
